Class MenuDAO

java.lang.Object
project2.MenuDAO
public class MenuDAO extends Object
Class that handles menu-related database queries.

  • Method Details

    • getAllMenuItems

      public static List<MenuDAO.MenuItem> getAllMenuItems()
      Get all menu items from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all MenuItem objects
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConnection

    • addMenuItem

      public static int addMenuItem(String name, double price, int isAvail)
      Add a new menu item to the database.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item
      price - Price of the menu item
      isAvail - Availability status of the menu item (1 for available, 0 for unavailable)
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added menu item, or -1 if the operation failed

    • updateMenuItem

      public static boolean updateMenuItem(int id, String name, double price, int isAvail)
      Update an existing menu item in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the menu item to update
      name - New name of the menu item
      price - New price of the menu item
      isAvail - New availability status of the menu item (1 for available, 0 for unavailable)
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteMenuItem

      public static boolean deleteMenuItem(int id)
      Delete a menu item from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the menu item to delete
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • getAllAvailableMenuItems

      public static List<MenuDAO.MenuItem> getAllAvailableMenuItems()
      Get all available (in stock) menu items from the database.
      Returns:
      List of available MenuItem objects
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConnection

    • placeOrder

      public static boolean placeOrder(List<MenuDAO.MenuItem> orderItems)
      Place an order by inserting order items into the database.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of MenuItem objects representing the order
      Returns:
      True if the order was placed successfully, false otherwise

    • addMenuItemRecipe

      public static boolean addMenuItemRecipe(int menuItemId, List<Integer> ingredientIds)
      Add recipe entries for a menu item.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - ID of the menu item
      ingredientIds - List of ingredient IDs to add to the recipe
      Returns:
      True if the addition was successful, false otherwise

    • getMenuItemIngredients

      public static List<Integer> getMenuItemIngredients(int menuItemId)
      Get ingredient IDs for a given menu item.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - ID of the menu item
      Returns:
      List of ingredient IDs associated with the menu item

    • deleteMenuItemRecipe

      public static boolean deleteMenuItemRecipe(int menuItemId)
      Delete the recipe for a menu item.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - ID of the menu item to delete
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • updateMenuItemRecipe

      public static boolean updateMenuItemRecipe(int menuItemId, List<Integer> ingredientIds)
      Update the recipe for a menu item by replacing existing ingredients with new ones.
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - ID of the menu item to update
      ingredientIds - List of new ingredient IDs for the menu item
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise
